description: Phase 3 evaluates all candidate reasoners before committing to a runtime architecture. Results determine whether Phase 4+ use Vampire, OWL, or Prolog.

phase-01-ontology-toolchain.reason: Uses Vampire from planning container as benchmark baseline

phase-02-uav-ontology.reason: Benchmarks are run against the UAV domain ontology

vampire_fast_enough.impact: Dramatically simplifies architecture - no translation needed, eliminates phases or merges them

owl_reasoner_best.condition: OWL reasoner faster than Vampire with acceptable translation loss
owl_reasoner_best.impact: Phase 4 becomes OWL integration instead of Prolog, uses Sigma export

prolog_best.condition: Prolog fastest with manageable translation effort
prolog_best.impact: Proceed with original SUMO-to-Prolog translation plan

parallel_execution.notes: Depends on Phase 1 and 2 completion. Results gate downstream architecture decisions.

tools: Sigma Knowledge Engineering Environment (for OWL export)
QEMU (for ARM emulation if Jetson unavailable)
arm_build_requirements: All recommended reasoners must build for aarch64
